name: DashBurst
tag_list: social-media, search, marketing, design, apps, analytics, facebook, twitter, google, linkedin, tools, infographics, presentations
overview:
DashBurst is a place to discover, bookmark and share interesting new content and useful apps. Users can quickly search shareable media like videos, images, infographics, stats, presentations, guides and more.

Dashburst’s social dashboard and browser extensions provide tools to manage and analyze all of your social media including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Google+ and blogs.

DashBurst is also a creative media agency and independent news source covering the latest in technology, business, marketing, art, digital culture and design. Client services range from website development, graphics, apps, SEO, testing, marketing, presentations, infographic design, IT consulting and social media strategy.

milestones.description: Launched New Website Providing Tools for the Web, Sharing on Social Media and Twitter Marketing
milestones.source_description: DashBurst Launches Creative Design Agency Providing Free Tools for the Web, Sharing on Social Media and Twitter Marketing
